data.text: @Oilfield_Rando CLOWN countryâ€™: @Oilfield_Rando takes our pals in Congress APART highlighting the worst of the WORST in new omnibus spending bill https://t.co/bexjm8gCRG
@Oilfield_Rando "..We are a clown country...." DING DING DING....We have a winner...
@Oilfield_Rando Read: $3.2 billion for energy companies who donate to political campaigns.
@Oilfield_Rando We are led by deeply unserious people. @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @LeaderMcConnell @SenSchumer @SpeakerPelosi @GOPLeader @LindseyGrahamSC
@Oilfield_Rando That's how "The Big Guy" and his connected cronies get their cut of that sweet government cash, the "green" in green energy.
@Oilfield_Rando We are no longer a country. We are their piggy bank. We are no longer FREE, at least in NY

@Oilfield_Rando The only way we can wrestle control from our wild spending representatives is to convene The Convention of States. I am serious- the spending by our representatives is out of control. I mean BOTH parties are doing this to us. Voting for a Dem or Rep is  not stopping this.
@Oilfield_Rando Why are the American people funding our own oppression?
@Oilfield_Rando It's a shitshow.  It never ends.  I guess it will just keep going until one day it won't.
